row.process:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RES : ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.STORE", "START_CLUSTER", T, Y : SET &FILENAME# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#, "pck_websphere_start_cluster.py")
: SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = 'java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/itpa-tool.jar" ' : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, 'arb -cmd execute ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&WSADMIN#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-user "&UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-password "&UC4RB_WAS_PASSWORD#" ') : IF &UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP# <> "localhost" : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-host &UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP# ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-port &UC4RB_WAS_PORT# ' ) : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-f "&FILENAME#" ')
! Add list argument of python to command : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_WSADMINLIB#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_UTILSLIB#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_CLUSTER_NAME#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"NO" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '&UC4_PWD# ')
! logging the command : PRINT &UC4RB_WAS_CMD#
&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#
